refnamediv.refpurpose: Calculate the spectral centroid of a signal.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Calculate the spectral centroid of an audio signal on a given trigger.

refentry.refsect1: Initialization ifftsize -- fftsize. Non pow-of-two values are converted to the next pow-of-two not smaller than ifftsize.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kcent -- the spectral centroid in Hz
ktrig -- 1 to calculate a new centroid, 0 to skip the process (and output previous value).
